name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Malicious Script Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed malicious PowerShell scripts to access sensitive data and moved laterally across the network.

parallel--1a2d3b4c-5e43-4820-be38-aa2b79.name: Initiate Mitigation Actions
parallel--1a2d3b4c-5e43-4820-be38-aa2b79.description: Simultaneously execute mitigation actions against the malicious threat.

action--b4c0b7bc-9f20-414e-9ab0-e9b7e584.name: Terminate malicious PowerShell processes
action--b4c0b7bc-9f20-414e-9ab0-e9b7e584.description: Terminate any running PowerShell processes identified as malicious.

action--2ae08a38-43d6-4f0f-854e-68f6d30e.name: Block network connections from host-34
action--2ae08a38-43d6-4f0f-854e-68f6d30e.description: Block all network connections from the malicious host.

action--b627a8a9-5d35-4066-af3b-0b8bfa1b.name: Identify and revoke compromised credentials
action--b627a8a9-5d35-4066-af3b-0b8bfa1b.description: Identify all compromised users and revoke their access.

commands.command: for user in $(get_compromised_users); do net user $user /del; done

action--b627a8a9-5d35-4066-af3b-0b8bfa1b.loop: For each user with unauthorized access

action--544e6ca1-fd90-4cd1-8e92-c17934c5.name: Patch all systems with the latest security updates
action--544e6ca1-fd90-4cd1-8e92-c17934c5.description: Ensure all systems are updated with the latest patches.
action--544e6ca1-fd90-4cd1-8e92-c17934c5.loop: Repeat until all hosts are updated

action--3fbbe128-b5bd-4e69-96ea-0076c7ab.name: Conduct full network scan for residual threats
action--3fbbe128-b5bd-4e69-96ea-0076c7ab.description: Scan the network for any remaining threats.

commands.command: if nmap -sS -T4 192.168.1.0/24 | grep -q 'threat'; then echo 'Threat indicators found'; fi

action--3fbbe128-b5bd-4e69-96ea-0076c7ab.condition: If any threat indicators are found
